name: LiteChat
description: Fullstack CRUD project with responsive design and REST API. Providing quick group chats with real time voice communication in a browser chatroom.
tech: React, CSS(Sass), Bootstrap, Redux, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Socket.io, webRTC, Figma

name: LCPLanner
description: Fullstack CRUD mobile app to help users plan and recap Leetcode problems progresses.
tech: React Native, Typescript, Expo, CSS(Sass), Node.js, GraphQL, JWT, MongoDB

name: Pinguine
description: Fullstack CRUD project with responsive design and REST API. Help users to easily save/bookmark locations and places on a map.
tech: React, CSS(Sass), Redux, MUI, Node.js, Express, MySQL, JWT

name: Portfolio
description: Responsive portfolio page implementing 3D in the browser.

name: Hackathon project with Unbounce
description: Winning team of 1 day Hackathon with the company Unbounce. Collaborate with UX designers to help Unbounce retain customer royalty.
